messages.text: Hey team, our staging deployment is failing with error: ImagePullBackOff.
Looks like the Docker image was not pushed correctly to ECR.
Ah right, I forgot to run `docker push` after the build. Pushed it now.
Cool. Rerunning the pipeline now, deployment is successful ✅
Why is our pod stuck in CrashLoopBackOff?
Check the logs with `kubectl logs <pod>` — probably configmap missing.
Yep, logs show `KeyError: DB_HOST`. We forgot to mount the configmap.
Fixed by adding configmap mount in deployment YAML. Restart worked ✅
